Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these ten stories people learned about various announcements and viewpoints around the world. Some expressed disappointment with the federal budget for not providing enough support for Australians while others lauded a $2 billion fund for hydrogen production. Meanwhile disability advocates anxiously monitored the government's efforts to cap NDIS expenses and Premier Mark McGowan released his state budget with cost-of-living relief measures. Finally a UK tabloid apologized to Prince Harry and a program preview interviewed the organizer of a wild and raunchy annual running event.
